name: NSFontCollection.Visibility
desc: Constants that specify the visibility of font collections.

items.name: static var process: NSFontCollection.Visibility
items.desc: The font collection is visible within this process and is not persistent.

items.name: static var user: NSFontCollection.Visibility
items.desc: The font collection is visible to all processes and is stored persistently.

items.name: static var computer: NSFontCollection.Visibility
items.desc: The font collection is visible to all users and is stored persistently.
